title: New Jersey Man Arrested in Connection With Threat to Synagogues
description: An 18-year-old man was charged with sending a threat over social media. He is expected to appear in court on Thursday afternoon.
dc:creator: Hurubie Meko
media:description: Police officers stood watch outside Temple Beth-El synagogue in Jersey City, N.J., last week after the F.B.I. warned of a threat made against synagogues in the state.
